biotools.summary: To assist in understanding the flexible protein-ligand interactions, we constructed this tool, an encyclopedia of about one thousand experimentally solved conformational ensembles of druggable binding sites in proteins, grouped by location and consistent chain/cofactor composition. The core of it is derived regularly from the Protein Data Bank and the Uniprot Knowledgebase.

bioschemas.name: Pocketome
